aboutus.title: About Us
aboutus.description: VacApp is a mobile app created for livestock farmers and veterinarians in Peru. Our mission is to facilitate livestock management through an accessible platform, even for those without prior technology experience. From animal registration to report generation, VacApp is made for you.
aboutus.subtitle: We connect livestock tradition with technological solutions.

list.title: Animal Registration
list.description: Register and manage cattle with detailed records of origin, breed, and status.

list.title: Health Records
list.description: Track vaccination history and medical treatments for each animal.

list.title: Smart Reminders
list.description: Automated alerts for health checks, treatments, and key farming events.

list.title: Automated Reports
list.description: Generate visual reports on health, production, and farm efficiency.

list.title: Medical Prescriptions
list.description: Issue and store veterinary prescriptions with medication details and dosages.

list.title: Inventory Management
list.description: Monitor supplies like vaccines, tools, and feed in real-time.

plans.name: Free
features: View monthly reports in simple format.
plans.description: Start with basic features to manage your livestock.

plans.name: Premium
plans.description: All the power of VacApp to optimize your livestock production.
